---
title: "Testing vertical transmission rates in tissue culture between taxa"
author: "Zachary Foster"
date: "11/17/2014"
output: html_document
---

A possibly relevant study could be to take a varity of rhododendrons, record their microbioms using metabarcoding, tissue culture them, and then record the microbioms of the cultured clones to see what taxa were retained. 

It would also be interesting to compare this to transmission in seed.
